HomePage.slogan: Your partner for all your conversations!

DashboardHome.welcome: Welcome to the Cookiebot Settings Panel!
DashboardHome.inviteMeText: Want to add me to a group? Select “+ Invite Me!” Or if you want to tweak a setting, go ahead and select it! If you have any questions, contact @MekhyW

DashboardGeneral.welcomeLabel: Enter here the message that will appear when someone joins the group.
DashboardGeneral.chatRulesLabel: Enter here the chat rules that appear when you type the command /rules
DashboardGeneral.checkOptions1: Avoid conflicting commands with other bots

DashboardModeration.title: Moderation Settings
DashboardModeration.captchaSubtitle: Set the time in seconds for the Captcha to Enter the Group
DashboardModeration.stickerSubtitle: Set the number of stickers sent to trigger spam warning
DashboardModeration.timeoutSubtitle: Set the time in minutes without sending images when someone joins the group

DashboardPosts.title: Posts and Publications
DashboardPosts.sliderSubtitle: Set the maximum number of posts sent by Cookiebot daily to your group
DashboardPosts.content: Allow sending posts from this group to others
DashboardPosts.receive: Allow receiving posts from other groups

HTTPCodes.404: Oops, this page does not exist! Check the URL and try again.
HTTPCodes.429: Oops, we have limited your access to the application, try again later.
HTTPCodes.403: You do not have permission to access this page.
HTTPCodes.500: Oops, a bizarre error occurred, try again or contact the developer if it persists.
